topic.topicDialog: Your teachers might use Kerboodle to set assignments for you. These assignments can be used to set homework and track your progress. Follow these steps to access your assignments.

step.stepTextTip:
Once logged into Kerboodle, access your course by clicking on the course name on your homepage.

Tip: any current assignments can also be accessed from the Today's Events panel.
Your assignments will be listed in the Assignments panel on your course page. Just click on the title to launch the assignment.

Your assignment will open in a new window with the introduction page showing any instructions your teacher has added.

Click on the Menu bar to get started.
The Menu will list all of the resources within the assignment, click on the title of the resource to open it in the assignment window.

Use the menu bar to move through the rest of the resources and complete the assignment.

If your teacher has asked for you to return a document as part of the assignment, please have a look at the tutorial called Returning Work as part of an Assignment.
